column4: hello, I try to use this command in lftp "open ftp://user/name:password@example.com", which 'user/name' is my ftp account name and can't be changed. this give out an error "Name or service not known", how to resolve it
but dont forget to beat him
i didnt even know / is allowed in usernames
the same. I don't know it before.
just tell him he should give you a real username
and also try only the thing after \
if that is not working, beatm him
not working. in lftp, this command "user user/name" and manually input password works.
but beat him or better, change the provider
a provider which is giving such names is a very bad provider
I'll try contact the provider then..
